short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Markdown Support to V2EX.com's Reply Section

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add Markdown Support to V2EX.com's Reply Section

Ver 1.1.2 (Chrome only, there will not be a FF copy of this version)
  -Base64 pattern matching improvement.

Ver 1.1.1
  -Added a separate switch for B64 decoder.

Ver 1.1.0
  -Added inline Base64 decoder.

Ver 1.0.3
  -Added emoji support.

Ver 1.0.2
  -Fixed a bug some embedded pictures were not displayed.

Ver 1.0.1.5
  -Fixed a bug that prevented extension from working.

Ver 1.0.1
  -Bug fixes.

Ver 1.0.0
  -Initial release.
